code: import Lenis from"@studio-freight/lenis";var lenis=function lenis(){var lenis=new Lenis({duration:1,easing:function easing(t){return Math.min(1,1.001-Math.pow(2,-10*t));}});function raf(time){lenis.raf(time);requestAnimationFrame(raf);}requestAnimationFrame(raf);lenis.on("scroll",function(e){console.log(e);});};export default lenis;
